metadata.feature_description: Manages content workflows including draft, submit, approve, publish, and reject states with history tracking

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Assets and select Images folder
steps.expected: Folder displays in assets panel with workflow indicator
steps.actual: Images folder visible with files showing Draft status badges

steps.action: Click edit button on Images folder
steps.expected: Folder details panel opens showing workflow settings
steps.actual: Details panel opened with tabs: Details, Permissions. Shows Workflow dropdown set to Content Approval

steps.action: Click on Workflow dropdown to view options
steps.actual: Dropdown shows: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval (selected), Test Workflow, Test & <> "Special" Chars!

steps.expected: Workflow option changes and shows pending items action
steps.actual: Workflow changed to Direct Publish. 'Pending Items' section appeared with 'Publish All' and 'Discard All' radio options

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View file details with workflow tab

steps.action: Hover over test_image-Copy.png file and click edit button
steps.expected: File details panel opens with workflow tab
steps.actual: File details panel opened with tabs: Details, Versioning, Workflow

steps.expected: Workflow tab shows current state, actions, and history
steps.actual: Workflow tab displayed with: file preview, Workflow Comment field, Submit/Discard buttons, and workflow history table showing State Initiated (Draft) and Workflow Started (Content Approval)

steps.action: Click Submit button on workflow tab for Draft file
steps.expected: File transitions from Draft to Ready For Review state
steps.actual: Success notification displayed. File status changed from 'Draft' to 'Ready For Review'. Buttons changed from Submit/Discard to Publish/Reject

steps.expected: History shows new state transition entries
steps.actual: History now shows 4 entries: State Initiated (Ready For Review), Draft Completed, State Initiated (Draft), Workflow Started

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Reject file with state transition back to Draft

steps.action: Click Reject button on Ready For Review file
steps.expected: File transitions back to Draft state
steps.actual: Success notification displayed. File reverted to Draft state
History shows 6 entries including 'State Discarded' - The State 'Ready For Review' has been discarded. Buttons reverted to Submit/Discard

steps.action: Submit Draft file again and then click Publish
steps.expected: File transitions through workflow and gets published
steps.actual: File submitted successfully, then Publish button clicked. Success notification. File no longer shows workflow badge indicating it's now published

steps.action: Navigate to test_special_!@#chars.txt Draft file and view workflow tab
steps.expected: File shows in Draft state with Discard option
steps.actual: File displayed in Draft state with Submit and Discard buttons. Workflow history shows Workflow Started and State Initiated (Draft)
Success notification. File removed from the assets list (file was deleted since it was never published)

steps.action: Review workflow history table throughout testing
steps.expected: History shows all workflow state transitions with timestamps, users, actions, and comments
steps.actual: Workflow history table correctly displayed all transitions: Workflow Started, State Initiated, Draft Completed, State Discarded. Each entry shows Date, User (SuperUser Account), Action, and Comment columns

steps.action: Complete full workflow cycle: Draft -> Submit -> Ready For Review -> Reject -> Draft -> Submit -> Ready For Review -> Publish
steps.actual: Successfully transitioned through all states. File progressed from Draft to Ready For Review, was rejected back to Draft, then submitted again and finally published. Workflow badge removed after publish indicating completion

observations: Content Approval workflow is configured at the folder level, not individual file level
When changing folder workflow from Content Approval to Direct Publish, the system offers 'Publish All' or 'Discard All' options for pending items
Versioning can be enabled/disabled alongside workflow configuration
The Discard action on a Draft file that was never published results in file deletion
Workflow history provides comprehensive audit trail with timestamps, user identification, action type, and descriptive comments
Multiple workflows are available: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow, and custom workflows with special characters
File preview is available directly in the workflow tab
